reviews.review_text: Back when games were games. Still have the manual for this. MMmmm physical copies.

Must buy! A classic. I have to admit I didn't even think twice about buying this game, and when I did, downloaded and the title screen came up, a wee tear formed in my eye, It was my childhood returned.   I played this game when it was originally released and I'm that bad of a horder that I still have a hard copy of the game manual.   The only game better in the genre was Pharoah/Cleopatra.

I was so happy to see Caesar 3 on Steam! One of the best strategy games ever made, and very unique due to its gameplay. You just dont build simply a theatre next to your casas, the actors have to pass them in order to entertain the citizens. Love it 10/10.
Really fun city-builder. Played this when I was about 10, didn't really get it then, enjoy it a lot now.
tottaly reccomend. but can some one patch this might have a few bugs. but for 7 79 you cant argue best bargain for one of the most nostalgic city builders ever.

Definitely my MOST wanted game on steam. Although it may be lacking in the performance issues or resolution compared to other city builder games, having an objectives on building a city seems clearly fresh.

This game is just awsome. Even after so many years. Remember having a portuguese(BR) version of the game that came in a bundle with a antivirus. how to forget when you clicked in a worker and he said 'Como um carroceiro pode continuar trabalhando sem ter o que comer?' 11/10
